name: chaincms
description: chainCMS is a content management system based on the steem blockchain. Our goal is to provide creators with a powerful, scalable, and cost effective tool for publishing content that can be installed on their own servers for free.
author: Hoxly Inc.

scripts.test: node node_modules/polymer-cli/bin/polymer.js lint -r polymer-2 && node node_modules/polymer-cli/bin/polymer.js test
scripts.build: node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/polymer-cli/bin/polymer.js build
